transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha sir bataiye.
Customer: Ha wo kya bata raha tha HDFC card mein main leke tha wo subscription wo.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Credit card pe wo wala EMI convert ho jayega bola tha. Abhi EMI convert bhi nahi ho raha hai. Kuch problem bhi ho raha hai aur kuch mere ko
Customer: Wo kuch customer mil rahe hai na isse cancel karwana.
Executive: Bandh. Sir but aapko liye hue sirf do se teen din hue hai aapka package live hue. Sir dekhiye isme subscription koi aapka cancel nahi hota hai. First thing. Dusra sir ye ki agar aapko koi cheez agar written mein bhi hoti hai to uske upar action liya jata hai. Baki hamare yaha refund policy koi bhi nahi hai. Dusra sir aap ye dekhiye ki aapne package liye hue aapki services live hue 30th October ko live hui thi. First second to Saturday Sunday pad gaya tha aaj third Monday aaj first welcome call hua hai aapka. To itna jaldi to sir koi bhi company commit nahi karti na ki aapko teen din mein response mil jayega.
Customer: Ye theek hai sir. Ek do month dekh ke fir kuch use nahi hoga to cancel kar sakte hai kya?
Executive: Nahi sir cancel to dekhiye nahi hota hai cancellation policy to koi hai hi nahi sir.
Customer: Ye but aapko cancel mat karana kyu hai aap use to kariye na sir services ko. Aap bylead use nahi kar rahe hai aur bina use kare sir aap usko cancel karayenge to kaise hoga. Aap jab tak use nahi karenge sir services properly to response aayega bhi nahi na. Bylead aapko properly use karna hoga follow up lena hoga buyer se jo bhi aapki leads aa rahi hai unko aap daily ka ek ek do do use kariye. Main aapko pura welcome call pe guide kiya tha ki aapko three to four hours ke andar use karna hai bylead. Buyer koi bhi lead manager pe apne buyer se aap follow up rakhiye proper.
Customer: Theek hai sir dekh leta hu ek month.
Executive: Waiting bhi dijiye usko. Wo aap waiting bhi dijiye usko.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Customer: Dekhenge ek month dekhenge. Agar nahi hua to kuch cancel kar sakte hai kya?
Executive: Nahi sir cancel ka nahi hai sir cancel ka to koi process hai hi nahi. Aapko apna services aapne jo one year ka avail kiya hua hai wo aap proper use kariye bylead jo aapki hai. Daily ek ek do do bylead use kariye unse follow up rakhiye. Aur jo ratings hai wo aap lijiye proper.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- EMI not converting on HDFC card.

- Not receiving customers, wants to cancel subscription.



Resolution:

- Informed cancellation is not possible.

- Explained to properly use buyleads and follow up.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait and observe for a month.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, emi, cancellation, buyleads, refund
